title: This Bodes Darkly
author: VD
content_html:
President Trump’s biggest weakness has always been his personnel decisions. Like many a failed executive, he tends to base his hiring decisions upon whomever is willing to flatter him and agree with him most enthusiastically. And while this is just a CDAN blind item, which could easily have been planted by the opposition, it does merit keeping a wary eye on the situation.

The designs have already been set into motion. They were there before but now it’s go time. There’s even a code language. The second in charge and his funder are preparing to take out the winner and have the second in charge replace him. It has to be a health issue, which makes the plot all the darker. Es tu?

This blind obviously refers to JD Vance and Peter Thiel. But Trump has already been betrayed by one vice-president, so it would be surprising if he allowed it to happen again.

DISCUSS ON SG
